StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Metatranscriptomic Sequencing of Pre-Transplant Bronchoalveolar Lavage in Pediatric Stem Cell Transplant Patients

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: These data were generated with funding from the NIH NHLBI grant K23HL146936 and in collaboration with Jaap J. Boelens MD PhD, Caroline Lindemans MD PhD, and Birgitta Versluys MD PhD. For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: A description of the original data can be found in "The pulmonary metatranscriptome prior to pediatric HCT identifies post-HCT lung injury" Blood. 2021 Mar 25;137(12):1679-1689. (PMID:33512420). The original data can be found in the National Institutes of Health database for Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession phs002208.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local full or expedited IRB approval. An annual IRB review is required for access to this data. The determination of exempt or non-human subjects research is inappropriate. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local full or expedited IRB approval. An annual IRB review is required.
